scripts.start: export DEV_ENV=${DEV_ENV:-qa} &&  node scripts/build/gen_files_by_env.cjs && webpack serve --mode development --config webpack.config.cjs
scripts.add_tags_prod: git tag -a PROD-$(date "+%Y-%m-%d-%H.%M") -m "Deployed to PROD by ${GITHUB_ACTOR:-$(whoami)}" && git push --tags
scripts.deploy_prod_frontend: export DEV_ENV=production && source ./scripts/utils.sh && generate_declarations prod ic && node scripts/build/gen_files_by_env.cjs && dfx generate modclub_assets --network ic && dfx deploy modclub_assets --network ic && npm run add_tags_prod
scripts.deploy_dev_frontend: export DEV_ENV=dev && source ./scripts/utils.sh && generate_declarations dev ic && node scripts/build/gen_files_by_env.cjs && dfx generate modclub_dev_assets --network ic && dfx deploy modclub_dev_assets --network ic
scripts.deploy_qa_frontend: export DEV_ENV=qa && source ./scripts/utils.sh && generate_declarations qa ic && node scripts/build/gen_files_by_env.cjs && dfx generate modclub_qa_assets --network ic && dfx deploy modclub_qa_assets --network ic
